pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)8$(br)$(#bd951a)DPS:$()$(#ff0000)4 (4 DMG/1s)$(br)$(#bd951a)Poison Stats:$()$(#ff0000)2 DMG/1s. Lasts for 3s$(br)$(#bd951a)Range:$()$(#ff0000)6$(br)$(#bd951a)Seed Recharge Time:$()$(#ff0000)5s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Spore poisons Zombies. Asleep if exposed to light.$(br)$(#bd951a)"I only recently became aware of the existence of zombies. Like many fungi, I'd just assumed they were fairy tales or movie monsters. This whole experience has been a huge eye-opener for me."

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Puff-shrooms are cheap, but can only fire a short distance.
